html:
10.7.17  2:30 pm   did you write the music in "time mop" it's good

     yes, 5 years before the video was made

10.7.17  2:22 pm   who is bill wurtz?

     scientists are trying to figure that out

10.7.17  2:17 pm   i find myself to be quite a strange person, but no matter how hard i look, i cant find another person i would be comfortable being who i am with. 

     oh too real

10.7.17  1:59 pm   What would you call this chord: C-F-A-D-E ? I play it on the guitar often but I don't know what it is. If the strings matter the C is on the A string (standard tuning) and then the rest are just in order ending with the high E string which I play open in this chord. I think that it's some kind of F chord because I took the CFA part from the standard FCFACF barre guitar chord but I don't know what it might be called with the addition of that D and especially E. It sounds melancholy and strange but it's nice. Thanks.

     Dmin9 over C would be fine

10.7.17  1:56 pm   Is there any reason that you repeat these answers a lot, other than for comedic purposes?:
"scientists are still trying to figure that out"
"i know what you mean"
"that doesn't seem necessary"
"i will check"
"oh hell yeah"

     i guess that's just what happens after answering 30,000 questions

10.7.17  1:36 pm   

     you wanna come over and just be cool and wear normal person clothes, and work on stuff with me, or work on what you're working on and i'll work on what i'm working on, and we could race to see who could get more work done faster

10.7.17  12:11 pm   Oh didn't you hear? Yur gay! if you listen to Justin Bieber! /s (you've made me appreciate pop more, thanks)

     it does not necessarily mean that, it could also mean you are a girl. or maybe you just think like a girl. or maybe you just like girls

10.7.17  11:38 am   Do you think Stevey wonder is actually blind,

     yes

      or is he just faking it?

10.7.17  11:33 am   How do I transfer things from my short term memory to my long term memory?

     experience it again, another time. then perhaps a 3rd time

10.7.17  10:50 am   behind, backside, back end, hindquarters, hiney, rear, rear end, posterior, bottom, seat, haunches, rump, butt, buttocks, bum, tail, fanny, derriere, keister, tush, tushy, ass, arse, buns, cheeks, booty, badonkadonk, money-maker, trunk, patootie, patoot, gluteus, gluteus maximus... what am I missing??

     the front part of the body

if yes could you give us a sneek peek ?

i really feel "we could just get high" would be a great closer, with everyone singing "we could get hiiiiiiiigh" forever, kinda like the end of "Hey Jude"

     i feel like most of the songs on the list haven't been recorded yet

     i have an entire section of my website dedicated to that, i will continue expanding it, over time

     oh too real

     that doesn't seem necessary

     everyone is bad

     i don't know

     that depends on how hard i try

     at home

10.7.17  4:09 am   What's the time signature of this song https://youtu.be/WH3tkGViAPY

     it constantly changes

10.7.17  2:42 am   How often do you not answer questions just because it looks bad on your questions page, and not because you don't have an answer?

     41% of the time

10.7.17  2:41 am   why doesn't my guitar teacher finish his phrases? he has amazing technique, but it doesn't sound good.

     ah, teachers. when will they learn

10.7.17  2:37 am   what's your next big project?

     a regularly scheduled series of medium projects

10.7.17  2:24 am   Why was "school" released 5.13.14 on your website, but wouldn't be released until 8.10.15 on youtube?

     it was released in in both places on 5.13.14, and then re-uploaded in both places to fix a spelling error on 8.10.15

10.7.17  1:10 am   can i raid your fridge

     sure if i can raid yours

10.7.17  1:01 am   Would "Bill Wurtz is Bill Wurtz" be an accurate way to describe you?

     seems redundant and not a useful description. but accurate i suppose

10.7.17  12:41 am   what city do u reside in ?

     nashville

     i feel like we would get along well

10.6.17  11:58 pm   how do i know if the ocassionally troubled artist lifestyle is right for me?

     you will find yourself living it

10.6.17  11:05 pm   i consider myself quite heterosexual

     me too

      but i totally would go gay for you if i could

     that doesn't seem necessary

10.6.17  10:54 pm   Bill, I know your not a doctor (well, actually I don't know that, maybe you are)... but I'm a guitar player and lately I've been having this pain in the side of my wrist. And I'm kind of freaking out about it, because I always hear of musicians getting repetitive strain injuries and carpal tunnel syndrome and stuff like that. Have you ever dealt with something like that?

     which hand

10.6.17  10:25 pm   why can't i click on the q in the ueqstions

     you can, although nothing will happen

10.6.17  10:10 pm   If everyone hates pop music, then why is it pop? Reminds of that Yogi Berra quote, "nobody goes there anymore, it's too crowded". 

     the amount of people who like and dislike it are both higher than less popular music

10.6.17  9:54 pm   10.6.17  6:18 pm   Not to be argumentative or anything... you obviously know your situation better than I do... but maybe people want to work with you because they really dig what you're doing, and not because they just want to get publicity out of it? Although, I'm sure you get things on both sides of the spectrum with this. The whole "collab" thing has become very fake, like 2 people pretending to be friends, who really don't know each other at all, doing a video together only because their managers or promoters or whoever arranged it for them. Then they'll beat the dead horse of doing some kind of 'challenge vid' or some other over-done concept just for the sake of advertising eachother's channels to the other person's fan base... I'm not saying I think you should feel pressured or obligated to collaborate with other people or anything like that, but maybe it's kind of an over-generalizatio n to say that other people are only interested in working with you for publicity's sake?

     i never said that

     Like, man, if I lived in NY I'd be emailing you all the time to try to convince you to get together and jam with me hahaha... I wouldn't want it to be recorded or put up on the internet. I'd just love to play music with you.

10.6.17  9:51 pm   spotify thinks you collabed with rob rhaspy

     i have told him to delete my info from that song so people stop asking me about it, and he said he did. but i guess i will have to talk to him again

     at haytime

10.6.17  9:29 pm   Do you like lizards

     they're ok

10.6.17  9:20 pm   Don't you hate it when your mom slams your face into the keybehdheshhb6us$

     i usually do it myself

10.6.17  9:18 pm   where is the wood

     in the trees

10.6.17  9:07 pm   Bill, how can i gain Power?

     a little bit at a time. or who knows maybe someone willl randomly give it to you, but that is rare

10.6.17  8:33 pm   What was the last song or video of yours that you actually listened to or watched in its entirety (not counting un-uploaded content)?

     outside, before it was uploaded

10.6.17  8:04 pm   will you ever make a vid longer than history of the entire world, i guess?

     i hope not

10.6.17  7:34 pm   Are you an Atheist?

     that seems boring

10.6.17  7:29 pm   Why do you hate India?

     i do not, but why do you

10.6.17  7:20 pm   Why are so many of your answers dismissive and unsatisfying?

     to delay people from finding the ones where i say way, way too much

10.6.17  6:55 pm   don't worry i'm lonely too so maybe we could be lonely together 

     oh that sounds nice

10.6.17  6:40 pm   Do you feel like your work would become higher quality if you had some form of emotional support

     no

10.6.17  6:40 pm   Any cool drum parts you've heard in a pop song recently?

     popular music is disrespected all too frequently in this world, and i have learned that this page is not a safe space to talk about it

10.6.17  6:29 pm   do you actually receive these questions

     yes

10.6.17  6:18 pm   Hi Bill. I don't really understand what you mean when you say things like "i sort of had an infinite world of musical and artistic vision going on, which no one else seemed to relate to. it seems there were infinite things i wanted to figure out and create. and i was always extremely disappointed that no one seemed capable or willing to go on this journey with me"... Maybe that was the case when you were younger, or maybe even with people you've met or talked to face to face... But, you have so many huge fans (like millions of people probably) of the stuff you make, and judging by this question page, so many artists/musicians/writers who view you as a major influence and inspiration (myself included). So, I am confused why you think that people don't relate to what you're doing, or that people wouldn't love to go on your journey with you. 

     keep in mind, when i was in 3rd grade, most people didn't know what i was capable of, or what i would be capable of in the future. and even when the product finally comes out (which is like decades of hard work later), sure they may enjoy the product, but that has no bearing on whether they relate to the lifestyle it takes to create it. now it's a whole different story, because now there are a lot of people that want to collaborate with me for publicity
